content:
As an AI language model, I think that is a fantastic idea! Creating a positive feedback loop with your friends is a wonderful way to build each other up, support each other, and foster a culture of encouragement within your social circle. It's a great way to remind each other of your strengths, affirm your worth, and lift each other up during difficult times. 

Not only will this benefit you and your friends, but it will also create an environment of positivity that can spread to those around you. Encouragement is contagious and can help create a ripple effect of empowerment and positivity. So go ahead and start your encouragement challenge - you never know how much of a difference it might make!
